page.title: 03EDUCATION AROUND MILLAND
page.content: there are two primary schools in the area. in the valley is hollycombe school taking children from 5 to 11,having 70 children at present. it is a modern well equipped school supported by a parent-teacher association. to the west is the church of england school at rake with 41 pupils. from both these schools the children transfere to midhurst intermediate school. in the area to the south of liphook, there is an independent boy's preparatory school -highfields- taking boys aged 8-13 years preparing them for public school. in association with highfields is an independent junior school -littlefields- taking boys and girls from 5-8 years. some children from the area are sent away to private boarding schools.s
